EmailTemplate.name: SM-2018-11-Which Cloud Survey - Thank You.EMAIL-Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Completing our Which Cloud Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for completing our Which Cloud Survey, your insight is greatly appreciated! As a reward for your time, your $10 Amazon gift card is enclosed below. When choosing between cloud providers, there's no one-size-fits-all answer. How do you identify which cloud is the best fit and understand how much it would cost if you migrated there? Turbonomic can help.
Learn More <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/which-cloud-webinar-v-1]]>
Turbonomic Cloud Migration planning enables organizations to understand - and compare - the price costs of migrating optimized workloads from on-premises data centers to the public cloud, including licensing models and discounting mechanisms such as RIs and Azure Hybrid Use Benefit (AHUB). Watch this on-demand webinar, Choosing Between AWS and Azure: How to Enable a Data Driven Decision <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/which-cloud-webinar-v-1]]>, to learn how you can identify the best cloud for your applications, based on real-time, intelligent data. Regards, Megan {{my.Gift 10:default=edit me}}
